articles.author: Kaitlin Vogel
articles.title: 8 heart-healthy habits may slow biological aging by up to 6 years - Medical News Today
articles.description: Using the Life's Essential 8 checklist by American Heart Association, a new study found that good cardiovascular health can reverse biological aging by up to 6 years.
articles.content:
• A new study shows having good cardiovascular health may decrease the pace of biological aging.
  • Using Lifes Essential 8 (diet, physical activity, nicotine exposure, sleep health, BMI, … [+9000 chars]
